DOC.HEADLINE: BRIEFLY : TECHNOLOGY & TELECOMMUNICATIONS
DOC.TEXT: Intel Will Cut Chip Prices : The chip maker , keeping rivals at_bay , today will announce the first of two price_cuts on its microprocessors for the third quarter.The cuts are aimed at making Pentium the standard chip for PCs , which would eat_into the market of companies that make clones of Intel ' s previous-generation 486 chips . The planned cuts are expected to bring the price of the entry-level 60MHz Pentium below that of the company ' s 486DX4 chips by the end of the year , analysts said . Intel ' s 486 and Pentium chips are part of its x86 family of microprocessors , the brains inside an estimated 75 % of the world ' s personal_computers .
